A

AbstractController - Class in app.controllers
Superclass for controllers implemented according to the MVC pattern.
AbstractController() - Constructor for class app.controllers.AbstractController
 
AbstractModel - Class in app.models
Superclass for all models.
AbstractModel() - Constructor for class app.models.AbstractModel
 
AbstractViewPanel - Class in app.views
Superclass for all view panels in the application.
AbstractViewPanel() - Constructor for class app.views.AbstractViewPanel
 
addModel(AbstractModel) - Method in class app.controllers.AbstractController
Register a model in the controller and setup a binding for listening to events, i.e. changes made in the model.
addPropertyChangeListener(PropertyChangeListener) - Method in class app.models.AbstractModel
Register a listener to the the model, this will be a controller that wants to listen to changes done to the model.
addView(AbstractViewPanel) - Method in class app.controllers.AbstractController
Register a view in the controller in order to know what views should be notified in the case of a property change in a registered model.
